snippet: The Westminster Kennel Club Dog Show split with the pet food brand partly over concerns about the company’s sorrowful adoption ads.
abstract: Westminster Kennel Club Dog Show cuts ties with longtime sponsor Pedigree, made by Mars Petcare US, in part because of Pedigree's commercials featuring sad-eyed homeless pets up for adoption; organization says the advertisements do not fit with the message of the show as an upbeat celebration of dogs; Nestle Purina PetCare will replace Pedigree as the show's sponsor.
lead_paragraph: The Westminster Kennel Club Dog Show split with the pet food brand partly over concerns about the company’s sorrowful adoption ads.

headline.seo: Westminster Dog Show Parts Ways With Pedigree, a Longtime Sponsor
headline.main: Tired of Sad Ads, Kennel Show Takes ‘Dog With a Smile’ Tack
headline.print_headline: Tired of Sad Ads, Kennel Show Takes ‘Dog With a Smile’ Tack
